title: An individual bystander likely to help injured

content.question: An individual bystander is most likely to help an injured person under which of the following circumstances?

choices.label: When the bystander is the only other person present
When the other people present are not helping the injured person
When a large number of people are present

content.answer: When the bystander is the only other person present

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
